amendment.description: An amendment numbered 7 printed in Part A of House Report 119-399 to establish a voluntary pilot program to support State-led water quality improvements in waters impaired for nitrogen or phosphorus under section 303(d).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Nunn (IA) amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Nunn (IA) amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
